creator: poirier@pobox.com
text: The page on how to contribute patches is out of date.  Here are a couple of patches to update it.

Created attachment 22828
Patch for the xml file
creator: poirier@pobox.com
poirier@pobox.com
text:
Created attachment 22829
Patch for the html file after building

creator: rpluem@apache.org
text: Thanks for the patch. Committed as r711384. The changes will be visible on the site after resync at latest in a couple of hours. Hint: We only need the patch for the xml file. The html file is build locally by the developer committing the patch.
